scripts.text:
Insert into [dbo].[cfgSubmissionInfo] ( 
		[FileHandle]
      	,[PostDate]
      	,[PostDate_ID]
      	,[FormatFileName]
      	,[FormatFilePath]
		,[TableName]
		,[RawFileName]
		,[FilePath]
    )
Select 
	1 as FileHandle,
	Select getdate()-1 as PostDate,
	FORMAT(getdate()-1, 'yyyyMMdd', 'en-us') AS PostDate_ID  ,
 	'formatF_7.txt' as  FormatFileName,
 	'C:\Users\aparkhomenko\Desktop\BI\Task_7' as FormatFilePath,
 	'_rawATB' as TableName,
 	'Account_8.31.2017.txt' as RawFileName,
	'C:\Users\aparkhomenko\Desktop\BI\Task_7' as rawFilePath
Union all
Select 
	2 as FileHandle,
	convert(date,'20170831', 112) as PostDate,
	20170831 as PostDate_ID,
	'formatF_7_txn_chr.txt' as  FormatFileName,
 	'C:\Users\aparkhomenko\Desktop\BI\Task_7' as FormatFilePath,
 	'_rawTXNS_CHGS' as TableName,
 	'Transaction-Charge__8.31.2017' as RawFileName,
  	'C:\Users\aparkhomenko\Desktop\BI\Task_7' as rawFilePath;
